alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 4:25AM CDT until March 26 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR LAUDERDALE COUNTY... At 425 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nellieburg, or near Meridian, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Meridian around 430 AM CDT. Zero around 440 AM CDT. Marion around 445 AM CDT. Toomsuba and Alamucha around 500 AM CDT. Lauderdale and Kewanee around 505 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
